author: Nicholas Vilppu
comment: Nexus 6, Android 7.0, Moto 360v2. Every time I open the app on the watch it crashes on the phone.   > update: I ended up wiping my phone for unrelated reasons and reinstalling Ankidroid and then Ankiwear and now it seems to be working.   How do I submit bug reports though? I didn't see any way to in the app.

reply.author: Yannik
reply.content:
Glad to hear that it's working now. 
Usually after an app crashes you get the option to "report", there is currently no way of doing that from within the app.
You can also create an "issue" on the github page of the project if you have any problems or suggestions
